mapper.select: select c.cartId, c.supId, s.supImg, s.supName, s.supBrand, s.supPrice, c.cartQty, c.userId from cart c, supplement s where c.supId = s.supId and c.userId=#{userId} order by c.cartId
mapper.insert: insert into cart (userId, supId, cartQty) values (#{userId}, #{supId}, #{cartQty})
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where supId=#{supId} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into OrderProduct (orderId, supId, ordQty) select #{orderId}, supId, cartQty from cart where userId=#{userId}

insert into OrderInfo (orderId, userId, ordRcvReceiver, ordRcvZipcode, ordRcvAddress1, ordRcvAddress2, ordRcvPhone, ordRcvEmail, ordRcvMsg, ordPay) values ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{ordRcvReceiver}, #{ordRcvZipcode}, #{ordRcvAddress1}, #{ordRcvAddress2}, #{ordRcvPhone}, #{ordRcvEmail}, #{ordRcvMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordPay})
mapper.select: SELECT op.orderId, s.supId, s.supName, s.supPrice, s.supBrand, op.ordQty, s.supImg FROM OrderProduct op JOIN Supplement s ON op.supId = s.supId JOIN OrderInfo oi ON op.orderId = oi.orderId WHERE oi.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY op.orderId desc
